NetID Access
Please note that we are currently experiencing delays in the NetID provisioning process, which may temporarily impact the ability for students to access Canvas if they were not previously issued a NetID before 3/21/23. We are working in conjunction with campus to resolve issues as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding.

News & Spotlights






Innovative Partnership: UC Degree Completion

              Excited to announce our part in this $4.85 million state-funded initiative to help students reset and re-engage in their academic goals to complete their degree. Our goal is to offer solutions so that nothing stands in their way.
            







Joining Forces with edX to Develop MOOCs

              UCR University Extension and edX have partnered to launch our first free and open courses for edX learners, featuring course content in mental health, well-being and world languages to start.
